title: Sound On: Tackling Climate Change, Biden Agenda
itunes:title: Sound On: Tackling Climate Change, Biden Agenda
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Connecticut Governor Ned Lamont, Kathleen Hicks, Deputy Secretary of Defense, Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Emily Wilkins, and Bloomberg Defense Policy reporter Peter Martin.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
